events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position, including their resume and cover letter.
The application for the software engineering role has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster for further processing.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the recruitment process for this software engineering candidate.
Completed the initial screening call to discuss the candidate's experience with software development and technical skills.
The candidate responded enthusiastically to the screening feedback and expressed strong interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
A technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team for March 8th to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating proficiency in software engineering principles and coding.
HR interview is scheduled for March 11th to discuss company culture, benefits, and candidate expectations.
Candidate completed the HR interview, showing strong alignment with company values and culture during discussion.
An official job offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and other employment terms.
The candidate responded positively to the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the onboarding process.
Candidate formally accepted the job offer for the Software Engineer position and is excited to join the team.
The onboarding process started with the new hire completing all required documents and attending orientation sessions.
The recruitment process has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded as a Software Engineer.
